term.title: phosphorylation

item.text: A process (catalysed by enzymes) involving the transfer of a phosphate group from a donor to a suitable acceptor; in general, an ester linkage is formed, for example:,ATP + alcoholADP + phosphate ester

sources.item: PAC, 1997, 69, 1251. 'Glossary of terms used in bioinorganic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1997)' on page 1291 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199769061251)
